name: OR_IMP_PREP_STAFF
description: This table stores the user that prepped the implant before it was implanted.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMP_PREP_BY_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the user that prepped the implant before it was implanted.
